json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="value" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="rules">
<prop type="array" name="galleryApplications" identifiers="packageReferenceId">
<prop type="array" name="extensions">
<prop type="array" name="provisionAfterExtensions">
<prop type="array" name="networkInterfaceConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="dnsServers">
<prop type="array" name="ipConfigurations" required="True" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="applicationSecurityGroups">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="loadBalancerBackendAddressPools">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="loadBalancerInboundNatPools">
<prop type="array" name="ipTags">
<prop type="array" name="publicKeys" identifiers="path">
<prop type="array" name="secrets">
<prop type="array" name="vaultCertificates" identifiers="certificateUrl">
<prop type="array" name="additionalUnattendContent">
<prop type="array" name="listeners">
<prop type="array" name="excludeExtensions">
<prop type="array<@InstanceViewStatus_read>" name="statuses">
<prop type="array" name="substatuses">
<prop type="array" name="provisionAfterExtensions">
<prop type="array" name="dataDisks" identifiers="name lun">
<prop type="array" name="vhdContainers">
<prop type="array" name="zones">
